channel.title: Basic server making NEED HELP
channel.description:
ok, here am i again ;D the last time i got the same qeustion as now... `how do i start a server? `
now i know that i just have to edit a other client, but i didn´t got an answer what i have to edit so... i take an expample ... Fernanscape Link--> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,408458.0.html
so what do i have to edit to make it a private server? i have to edit something at the gui file... but the IP is already 127.0.0.1 (so that´s already private IP, right?). please help me, i already got this qeustion a long time... thnx for listening ;D :P

ow ok, sorry for this.

thnx

item.title: Basic server making NEED HELP
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

Clean up your post you barely make any sense. And if I understood right your trying to make a server and all your starting of is with the client…? If that is so proceed to punch yourself in the face and go read more guides you obviously haven’t gotten to basic procedure. And due to the lack of the ablity to make any sense at all you’ll be missing out on help.

Read full topic

item.title: Basic server making NEED HELP
item.dc:creator: @nkmol nkmol
item.description:
@nkmol wrote:

@ watch n lern, i said the IP was already 127.0.0.1

@Si Force, can u give me an example of a private server?

Read full topic

item.title: Basic server making NEED HELP
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If this is the question you’re asking; You must download and run a private server as well as your client so you connect to your private server through 127.0.0.1 .

Read full topic

item.title: Basic server making NEED HELP
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

you go into the GUI>java file and change the 127.0.0.1 ip to your server ip. then you compile and load the client.

Read full topic
